snippet: In questioning by the Senate Banking Committee, Janet L. Yellen, the nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, is likely to be asked about the direction of monetary policy and the outlook for regulation of big banks.
abstract: In questioning by the Senate Banking Committee, Janet L. Yellen, the nominee to lead the Federal Reserve, is likely to be asked about the direction of monetary policy and the outlook for regulation of big banks.

headline.main: What to Watch For at the Yellen Hearing
